fields.name: Instruction Modes
fields.value:
`IMUL r/m8*`
`IMUL r/m16`
`IMUL r/m32`
`IMUL r/m64`
`IMUL r16, r/m16`
`IMUL r32, r/m32`
`IMUL r64, r/m64`
`IMUL r16, r/m16, imm8`
`IMUL r32, r/m32, imm8`
`IMUL r64, r/m64, imm8`
`IMUL r16, r/m16, imm16`
`IMUL r32, r/m32, imm32`
`IMUL r64, r/m64, imm32`

fields.name: Description
fields.value: Performs a signed multiplication of two operands. This instruction has three forms, depending on the number of operands.

footer.text: Thanks to Felix Cloutier for the online x86 reference
